name: Alchemy (Rustywolf)
description:
Using your prowess as an alchemist, you're able to hold off a mighty demon - but for how long?

Controls:

A - Rotate left
D - Rotate right
S - Exit book vie
Left Click - Interact with the various items

There are 4 levels to attempt to beat, and an endless mode.

Use the ingredients from both tables, and either cauldron, to respond to the demon's threats with alchemy!

Credits:
